title: Coronavirus and COVID-19 information for parents
description: COVID-19 affects children and families in many different ways. Get answers from Children's Hospital at Richmond at VCU.
cleaned_text: We know this is a stressful time for our families. Get the latest COVID-19 updates and information you can trust from your children's hospital. COVID-19 important information: There is no patient responsibility for diagnostic COVID-19 testing. For more information, visit our
